MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA6 postcode area of Frodsham, affecting properties in Bridge Lane and surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further network investigations required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:32PM on 25th January 2021.
